name: ulvene
description:
ulvene - chased by wolves until you die then colors change. if it were a longer game jam :) there would be more to do during death.  

first game jam entry ever for brian (unity) and stevie (art) made for gamedev.tv gamejam between 5/21 and 5/30/2022. 

asdw to move. Pick up rocks. Aim with arrow keys and space bar to throw rocks at wolves.
